prompts.name: sentiment_analysis
prompts.template: Analyze the sentiment of the following text: "{text}". Provide a brief summary indicating whether the sentiment is positive, negative, or neutral.

prompts.name: keyword_extraction
prompts.template: Extract key topics from the following text: "{text}". List the most important keywords or phrases that capture the essence of the content.

prompts.name: entity_extraction
prompts.template: Identify and list all named entities (persons, organizations, locations, dates, miscellaneous) in the following text: "{text}". Return the results in JSON format.

prompts.name: entity_disambiguation
prompts.template: Disambiguate the following entities in the text: "{text}". Provide clarification for each ambiguous entity based on the context. Return the results in JSON format.
